name: Salamangreat Emerald Bird
text: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Rise of the Salamangreat". If this card is Ritual Summoned using monsters from your GY as material: You can add 1 "Rise of the Salamangreat" from your Deck or GY to your hand. Once per turn, if this card was Ritual Summoned using "Salamangreat Emerald Bird": You can destroy 1 card on the field, and if you do, your opponent takes damage equal to its original ATK.
